tool.name: qiime alignment mafft
tool.description: De novo multiple sequence alignment with MAFFT
tool.command:
qiime alignment mafft
--i-sequences=$isequences --o-alignment=oalignment
#set $pnthreads = '${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}'
#if str($pnthreads): --p-n-threads="$pnthreads" #end if
#if $pparttree: --p-parttree #end if ; cp oalignment.qza $oalignment

param.label: --i-sequences: ARTIFACT FeatureData[Sequence] The sequences to be aligned. [required]
param.name: isequences

param.label: --p-parttree: --p-no-parttree This flag is required if the number of sequences being aligned are larger than 1000000. Disabled by default [default: False]
param.name: pparttree

tool.help:
De novo multiple sequence alignment with MAFFT ##############################################
Perform de novo multiple sequence alignment using MAFFT.
Parameters ---------- sequences : FeatureData[Sequence] The sequences to be aligned. parttree : Bool, optional This flag is required if the number of sequences being aligned are larger than 1000000. Disabled by default
Returns ------- alignment : FeatureData[AlignedSequence] The aligned sequences.
